install.name: My Kunena Updates
install.author: Kunena
install.description: Show your forum replies on your community profile page

param.name: count
param.label: Post count
param.description: How many forum posts to display

param.name: coreapp
param.label: Core Application
param.description: Causes this application to not appearin the users applications list but it will allow this application to appear in the user profile automatically if selected.

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this plugin
